heading: What is a study group?
content: A study group is a small, collaborative learning community where students come together to review and discuss course materials.

heading: How can I join a study group?
content: You can join a study group by signing up on our website, browsing available groups, and requesting to join one that matches your interests.

heading: What are the benefits of joining a study group?
content: Study groups offer peer support, shared knowledge, increased motivation, enhancing your learning experience and academic performance.

heading: Can I invite friends to an existing study group?
content: Yes, you can invite friends to join an existing study group by sending them an invitation link or using their email addresses.
